home.title: Easy Booking
home.description: Book quickly, explore thousands of high-quality hotel options. Turn every trip into a memorable experience!

contactInfo.title: Contact information
contactInfo.description: Please fill in all information accurately to ensure you receive the booking confirmation via email.

specialRequests.title: Special requests
specialRequests.description: Upon check-in, the hotel will inform you whether these requests can be accommodated. Some requests may require additional fees, but you can always cancel the request later.

other.label: Other requests
other.placeholder: Example: non-smoking room, high floor, etc.

features.title: Core features
features.subtitle: We provide all the necessary tools to help you find and book hotel rooms easily and safely

search.title: Smart search
search.description: Smart search technology helps you easily find hotels that match your preferences and budget. Recommendations based on community reviews.

booking.title: Easy booking
booking.description: Simple 3-step booking process: select room, fill information, pay. Instant confirmation via email. Support for bookings 24 hours in advance.

payment.title: Secure payment
payment.description: Integration with popular payment methods: credit cards, bank transfers. SSL encryption protects payment information. Clear refund policy.

support.title: 24/7 support
support.description: Professional support team always available via email and live chat. Committed to quick and effective responses.

block1.title: New hotel booking platform
block1.description1: Established in 2024, we are a new hotel booking platform with the mission to provide an easy, fast, and secure online booking experience. Currently, we are focusing on developing in 5 major cities with over 50 quality hotel partners.
block1.description2: In the short period since our inception, we have served over 5,000 successful bookings, with a customer satisfaction rate of 95%. We continuously improve our technology and services to provide the best experience for users.

block2.title: Commitment to service quality
block2.description1: We constantly strive to improve service quality, from optimizing user experience to ensuring payment security. With our professional support team, we commit to responding to all customer issues within 30 minutes.
block2.description2: We are gradually building and developing new features such as smart search, community reviews, and travel trend analysis. This helps us continually improve in meeting customer needs.

achievements.title: Achievements
achievements.subtitle: Impressive numbers reflecting customer trust and satisfaction in our services

hero.title: Contact Us
hero.subtitle: We are available to support you 24/7

contact_info.title: Contact Information
contact_info.description: Please contact us if you need any assistance. Our team is always ready to serve you.

bookingGuide.title: Booking Guide
bookingGuide.description: Simple booking process in just 6 steps

1.title: Search for hotels
1.description: Start searching for hotels by entering destination information, landmarks, or hotel names and the number of nights.

2.title: Select hotel
2.description: On the search results page, select your desired hotel. Click "View rooms" to see detailed information about the accommodations.

3.title: Book hotel
3.description: On the hotel information page, select the room type and number of rooms you want to book.

4.title: Fill in contact information and guest details
4.description: Make sure all information is accurate, then proceed to payment.

5.title: Make payment
5.description: Select your preferred payment method. Be careful not to exceed the specified payment time.

6.title: Receive payment voucher
6.description: We will send a payment voucher to your email within 60 minutes after receiving your payment.

business.title: Business benefits

business.item2: Promote your brand on a trusted platform
business.item3: Utilize cutting-edge technology to optimize operations

how.title: How to register as a partner

step1.title: Fill in basic information
step1.description: Provide your business details and contact information

step2.title: Verify documents
step2.description: Upload the necessary documents for business verification

step3.title: Complete registration
step3.description: Sign the partnership agreement and start growing with us

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: What are the requirements to become a partner?
faq.a1: To become a partner, your business must meet the following conditions: have a valid business license, have experience in the tourism industry, have a professional team, and commit to providing high-quality services.
faq.q2: How long does the partner verification process take?
faq.a2: Typically, the verification process takes 3-5 business days after we receive all required documents. If additional information is needed, we will contact you immediately.
faq.q3: Is there a registration fee to become a partner?
faq.a3: We do not charge a registration fee for becoming a partner. However, a commission fee will be applied to each successful booking, calculated as a percentage of the total booking value.
faq.a4: We provide an online booking management system that allows you to easily track and process reservations. You can access this system 24/7 from any device.
faq.q5: Is technical support available for partners?
faq.a5: Yes, we offer 24/7 technical support for all partners through multiple channels, including email, phone, and live chat. Our support team is always ready to assist you.

more_questions.title: Still have questions?
more_questions.description: If you still have questions or need more information, please do not hesitate to contact us. Our support team is always ready to assist you.

cta.title: Ready to get started?
cta.description: Register today to become a partner and grow with us
